ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of other characters you have with "Eren(エレン)" or "Mikasa(ミカサ)" or "Armin(アルミン)" in its card name.

When this card attacks, if a card named "Outcry" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named ""Pursuit" Titan" in your memory, and put it on any position of your stage.

If you revealed one or more cards, choose up to one yellow character or card named "Anti-Titan Device "Omni-Directional Mobility Gear"" from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

ability: 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one card named ""Resisting Fate" Armin" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
